p.b: Syntax to upload a node artifact

section.title: Description
section.p: The ap upload command is used to replace an existing configuration file for a node. The configuration file has been added to the ENM CLI browser workspace.

The commands ap upload and ap resume can be used together. For example, if a configuration import fails because of an invalid configuration file, a new configuration file can be uploaded and the node integration can be resumed.
For more information on upload see Operations, Upload
